location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, forwards an estimate of the probable receipts and disbursements of the Residency for the half-year period ending 31 October 1824. Estimate not included.
